article.title: In what ways do today's leaders and employers need to change
article.text: Tech-savvy younger workers from Generation Y are accustomed to easy, speedy access to information. In the not-too-distant future, late Boomers and even Generation X workers will have to adapt to the ways that work force culture is changing as a result of this incoming generation's influence. Organizations are faced with the challenge to remain relevant, but must do so in a way that makes change a positive asset.
